segments.text: If we give you the job , what ’ s the most important thing you except to get ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I just want to enjoy what I ’ m doing . it ’ s the most important thing to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , because I think being interesting thing is the best teacher . Or have more opportunities to have career growth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to get a promotion ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where would you like to be in 5 years ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In five years , I ’ d like to be a senior manager of this corporation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you plan to accomplish this ?
segments.speaker: S1
